title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release 1d - IndusInd Bank launches 'INDIE' app for 15M customers with 1.4M new accounts and innovative features.
date: 1d - IndusInd Bank launches 'INDIE' app for 15M customers with 1.4M new accounts and innovative features.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome 3 Jun - IndusInd Bank held an analyst meet on June 3, 2025; no unpublished info shared; presentation public.
date: 3 Jun - IndusInd Bank held an analyst meet on June 3, 2025; no unpublished info shared; presentation public.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Allotment of ESOP / ESPS 2 Jun - Bank has allotted 1400 equity shares to 1 employee as on June 2, 2025
date: 2 Jun - Bank has allotted 1400 equity shares to 1 employee as on June 2, 2025

title: Appointment Of Secretarial Auditor 30 May - Appointment of M/s. Alwyn Jay & Co. as secretarial auditor for FY 2025-26 to FY 2029-30, subject to shareholder approval.
date: 30 May - Appointment of M/s. Alwyn Jay & Co. as secretarial auditor for FY 2025-26 to FY 2029-30, subject to shareholder approval.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating 29 May - CRISIL continues rating watch negative on IndusInd Bank's long-term debt; short-term ratings reaffirmed.
date: 29 May - CRISIL continues rating watch negative on IndusInd Bank's long-term debt; short-term ratings reaffirmed.
